sn22.35:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.35:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu;
sn22.35:1.4: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho, appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.35:1.5: “Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, anuseti, tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
sn22.35:1.6: yaṁ nānuseti, na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”ti.
sn22.35:2.1: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.35:2.5: Saṅkhāre ce anuseti tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.7: Rūpañce, bhante, nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.11: viññāṇañce nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.12: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.35:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
sn22.35:3.3: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, anuseti tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.8: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.12: viññāṇañce nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.13: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena, bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.35:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
sn22.35:5.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn22.35:5.2: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn22.35:5.3: Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.
